articles.title: 'Asia' not included in 'Australasia': Holidaymaker stung $28k after insurance invalid in India - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: A holiday to India turned into a nightmare for one man when Covid cost him $28,000.
articles.content: A man who ended up in hospital with Covid-19 while on holiday in India had to pay $28,000 when his insurer denied its policy covered Asia because the word was part of Australasia. Photo / Getty Image… [+2655 chars]
